==Profile==
<!-- detailed story/lore information goes here -->
Etsu was a scam artist from [[Inazuma]] who was caught by Heizou, arrested and sentenced to prison and community service. After she was released from prison, she performed community service at the [[Grand Narukami Shrine (Subarea)|Grand Narukami Shrine]]. During Heizou's Hangout Event, Heizou and the [[Traveler]] invited her to attend the [[Heizou Talks Fraud]] and act as a scam artist, promising to take five days off her community service if she did.
